name: Toddler Simulator (itch)
description:
Experience the thrills of parenting a huge, demanding toddler in this fast paced puzzle survival game. Unlike parenting, the toddler is the opposite of smaller than you, but like parenting, it can feel unwinnable! 

"Quite possibly the greatest game about putting away toys ever made!" - the developer, who is very tired

Free or donation, but we should probably pay YOU to play this. Sorry.
